etymology.description: 全 (complete) + 素食 (vegetarian food/diet) = fully vegetarian diet (vegan).
etymology.interpretation: 全 intensifies 素食 to mean a strictly vegetarian regimen that excludes all animal-derived ingredients, aligning with 'vegan.'

examples.chinese: 我坚持全素食(我堅持全素食)。
examples.english: I stick to a vegan diet.

examples.chinese: 这家餐厅提供全素食选项(這家餐廳提供全素食選項)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè jiā cāntīng tígōng quánsùshí xuǎnxiàng.

examples.chinese: 她因为过敏而选择全素食(她因為過敏而選擇全素食)。
examples.pinyin: Tā yīnwèi guòmǐn ér xuǎnzé quánsùshí.
examples.english: She chose a vegan diet because of allergies.
